## Description {#details}

This file implements the construction of a VPlan-based Hierarchical CFG (H-CFG) for an incoming IR.

This construction comprises the following components and steps:

<SectionDefinition>

## Defines

### DEBUG&#95;TYPE {#ad78e062f62e0d6e453941fb4ca843e4d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>#define DEBUG&#95;TYPE&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&quot;loop-vectorize&quot;</>}>

<ul>
<li><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-vplanhcfgbuilder-cpp-/plaincfgbuilder">PlainCFGBuilder</a> class: builds a plain VPBasicBlock-based CFG that faithfully represents the CFG in the incoming IR. A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpregionblock">VPRegionBlock</a> (Top <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/region">Region</a>) is created to enclose and serve as parent of all the VPBasicBlocks in the plain CFG. NOTE: At this point, there is a direct correspondence between all the VPBasicBlocks created for the initial plain CFG and the incoming BasicBlocks. However, this might change in the future.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="#l00028">28</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanhcfgbuilder-cpp">VPlanHCFGBuilder.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LoopOfBB == TheLoop) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">    RegionOfVPBB = Plan.getVectorLoopRegion();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">    RegionOfVPBB = Plan.createVPRegionBlock(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/graphprogram/#a0ad4685976f8c4d4a697a53fbe05d10b">Name</a>.str(), </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;isReplicator&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">    RegionOfVPBB-&gt;setParent(Loop2Region&#91;LoopOfBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#ae34bcd53f75fab0c03b509ecccb4cfaf">getParentLoop</a>()&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">  Loop2Region&#91;LoopOfBB&#93; = RegionOfVPBB;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VPBB;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Return true if \\p Val is considered an external definition. An external</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// definition is either:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1 A Value that is not an Instruction. This will be refined in the future.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2 An Instruction that is outside of the CFG snippet represented in VPlan,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// i.e., is not part of: a) the loop nest, b) outermost loop PH and, c)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// outermost loop exits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
